article_title: The Leapfrog Opportunity In The World's Underserved Health Care Markets

article_metadata.description: Like banking, healthcare once required investment-­heavy infrastructure to get traction. Now leapfrog tech development, entrepreneurial ingenuity, and extreme need promises to rapidly accelerate the pace of healthcare solutions. Some of the best and brightest inventions are coming from (and to) places you might not expect: poor nations with poor health outcomes.
article_metadata.author: Unity Stoakes
